comment: If there is a loop at vertex ` X ` , the set of (closed) walks on ` X ` of length ` 1 ` as words over the set of vertices is a singleton containing the singleton word consisting of ` X ` . (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2022.) (Revised by AV, 25-Feb-2022.) (Proof shortened by AV, 25-Mar-2022.)
